name: Sharp_Dressed_Man
text:
Sharp Dressed Man
"Sharp Dressed Man" was a song by ZZ Top.
History
The song was among the selections in the Double R Diner's jukebox.
On the night of October 1, 2016, the MC at the Roadhouse in Twin Peaks, Washington played "Sharp Dressed Man" as part of the Roadhouse Playlist. The playback stuttered and skipped when Freddie Sykes punched Chuck and Skipper, who had attacked James Hurley.
Behind the scenes
"Sharp Dressed Man" is a song by ZZ Top from their 1983 album Eliminator. The song was featured in "Part 15" of Twin Peaks (2017) and appeared on Twin Peaks (Music From The Limited Event Series).
